data.text: @mailandguardian @OneConnect As a mother of two kids I have battled alot with my financial state to the point of begging from friends just to survive,until I started Bitcoin trading with the help of @_AMBREYMARCUS1 I made a successful withdrawal of R 200,000 with the help of @_ambreymarcus1.

@mailandguardian @OneConnect Few month ago I was struggling to fend for my self and my kids ,at my last bus stop I decided to give Bitcoin trading a try ,through the help of @_ambreymarcus1 I was able to earn R250,000 in 2 weeks thank you so much Mr @_ambreymarcus1 .
